caption.p: Callose deposition in barley leaves. (a) Deposited callose in leave cells under different treatment. Arrows indicate the callose depositions. app: appressorium. Bar = 10 μm. (b) The number of callose deposition per 50 μm length of side wall at 32 h. Error bars represent the standard deviation. Significant differences compared with the wild-type strain were estimated by Duncan’s test: **P < 0.01, *P < 0.05. (c) The expression level of callose synthase-encoding genes ( OsGSL1, OsGSL3, and OsGSL5) in Guy11 and Δ Mosec61β-challenged rice leaves
